hero.title: Background Remover
hero.subtitle: Instantly create transparent backgrounds for your photos and product shots.

upload.title: Drag & drop an image here
upload.subtitle: or click the button below to upload

demo.hint: ‚ú® Try the slider above to see how background removal works, then upload your own image!

1.question: What file formats are supported for background removal?
1.answer: We support JPG, PNG, WebP, and most common image formats. For best results, use high-resolution images with clear subject-background separation.

2.question: How many credits does background removal cost?
2.answer: Background removal costs 2 credits per image. You can download the preview for free, but downloading the full resolution result requires credits.

3.question: What is the maximum file size I can upload?
3.answer: You can upload images up to 10MB in size. Larger files will be automatically resized while maintaining quality.

4.question: How accurate is the AI background removal?
4.answer: Our AI achieves 95%+ accuracy on most images. It works best with clear subjects like people, products, and animals against distinct backgrounds.

5.question: Can I replace the background with a custom color or image?
5.answer: Yes! After removing the background, you can choose from preset colors or upload your own background image to create the perfect composition.

6.question: Is my uploaded image stored on your servers?
6.answer: Images are temporarily stored for processing and automatically deleted within 24 hours. We prioritize your privacy and data security.

faq.title: AI Anime Generator FAQ
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about converting photos into anime art securely and in high quality.

1.question: Is this tool free to use?
1.answer: Yes, the core anime conversion experience is free. Upgrade only if you need ultra HD downloads or batch processing.

2.question: What image formats are supported?
2.answer: Upload JPG, PNG, or WebP files up to 12MB. Clear, front-facing portraits with simple backgrounds generate the best anime detail.

3.question: How long does each conversion take?
3.answer: Most renders finish in 10‚Äì20 seconds thanks to edge caching. Timing may vary slightly with server load, but the queue stays fast.

4.question: Is my photo safe?
4.answer: Absolutely. Images are only used for the current render and are automatically purged afterwards. We never reuse, store, or sell your photos.

5.question: Can I use the results commercially?
5.answer: Personal social posts are fine. Contact us for a lightweight commercial license if you plan to print merch, ads, or album covers.

6.question: How many credits does each render cost?
6.answer: Each anime portrait uses {credits} credits. Earn daily rewards or invite friends to top up for free.

faq.title: Everything about AI outfit swaps
faq.subtitle: Quick answers for stylists, creators, and marketing teams using the clothes changer.

1.question: What types of photos work best?
1.answer: Use clear, front-facing portraits for the person photo and well-lit outfit references where fabrics and layers are visible. Avoid heavy filters or blurred shots for best AI alignment.

2.question: Can I upload multiple outfit references?
2.answer: Yes. Upload the main subject image and the outfit image you want to transfer. After generating a result, you can change the outfit image and run again to compare looks.

3.question: Will the face or hairstyle change?
3.answer: No. The clothes changer keeps the original face, skin tone, pose, and hairstyle. Only garments, accessories, and fabrics adapt from the reference image.

4.question: How many credits does each render use?
4.answer: Every outfit swap costs 5 credits, the same as other premium editors in Nano Banana. Downloading the result in original quality is free once the render is complete.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI-powered image editor and generation tools

contact.text: Still have questions? We're here to help!

1.title: How does the AI image generator work?
1.description: Our AI image generator uses advanced machine learning models to create stunning images from text descriptions. Simply describe what you want to see, and our AI will bring your vision to life in seconds.

2.title: What image formats are supported?
2.description: We support all major image formats including JPG, PNG, WebP, and more. You can upload images up to 10MB in size and download your creations in high resolution.

3.title: Can I edit existing images?
3.description: Yes! Our image editor allows you to enhance, modify, and transform existing images using AI-powered tools. Upload any image and apply various effects and modifications.

4.title: How many images can I generate for free?
4.description: New users get free credits to try our image generation and editing tools. You can earn additional credits through our referral program or purchase credit packages for unlimited use.

5.title: What makes Nano Banana different?
5.description: Nano Banana combines multiple AI models to deliver the best results. Our platform offers both image generation and advanced editing tools in one seamless interface, perfect for creators and businesses.

6.title: Can I use generated images commercially?
6.description: Yes, images generated with Nano Banana can be used for commercial purposes. We provide full rights to the images you create, making it perfect for marketing, content creation, and business use.

7.title: How fast is the image generation?
7.description: Most images are generated within 10-30 seconds depending on complexity and current server load. Our optimized infrastructure ensures quick turnaround times for all your creative needs.

8.title: Do you offer API access?
8.description: We're working on API access for developers and businesses who want to integrate our AI image generation capabilities into their own applications. Contact us for early access information.

step1.title: Input Your Content
step1.description: Upload data, paste text, or describe the infographic you want to create. Our AI understands multiple input formats.

step3.title: Download & Share
step3.description: Export your infographic in high resolution. Share directly to social media or download for presentations.

prompts.title: Infographic Design Prompts
prompts.subtitle: Get inspired by these professional infographic prompts. Copy and customize them for your needs.

businessData.title: Business Data Visualization
businessData.prompt: Create a modern business infographic with clean data visualization. Include bar charts showing quarterly growth, pie charts for market share distribution, and key performance indicators with bold numbers. Use a professional blue and white color scheme with subtle gradients.

timeline.title: Colorful Timeline Process
timeline.prompt: Design a vibrant timeline infographic showing a step-by-step process. Use colorful circles or hexagons for each milestone, connected by flowing lines. Include icons for each step and brief descriptions. Color palette: orange, purple, blue, and green.

statistics.title: Statistics Dashboard
statistics.prompt: Create a modern statistics infographic with clean geometric shapes. Display key metrics in large bold numbers, use minimal line charts for trends, and incorporate circular progress indicators. Keep the design minimalist with a navy blue, white, and gold accent color scheme.

comparison.title: Comparison Chart
comparison.prompt: Design a colorful comparison infographic with side-by-side layouts. Use distinct colors for each category, include percentage bars, icons for visual hierarchy, and clear labels. Make it easy to compare multiple data points at a glance. Bright, energetic color palette.

minimal.title: Minimalist Statistics
minimal.prompt: Create a clean, minimalist infographic focusing on 3-4 key statistics. Use plenty of white space, simple geometric shapes, and a limited color palette of 2 colors. Display numbers prominently with small supporting text. Modern sans-serif typography.

process.title: Process Flow Diagram
process.prompt: Design a business process infographic showing workflow steps. Use numbered circles or squares connected by arrows, include brief descriptions for each step, and add relevant icons. Professional color scheme with blue as primary color and gray accents.

review1.name: Michael T.
review1.content: This AI infographic generator saved me hours of work! I used to spend days creating presentations, now I get professional results in minutes. The templates are modern and the AI suggestions are spot-on.

review2.name: Sarah K.
review2.content: As someone with zero design skills, this tool is a game-changer. I just paste my data and the AI creates beautiful infographics. My social media engagement has increased 300% since I started using InfographAI.

review3.name: David L.
review3.content: Finally, a tool that understands data visualization! The AI picks the right chart types and color schemes automatically. My reports look professional and are much easier for stakeholders to understand.

howItWorks.question: How does the AI Infographic Generator work?
howItWorks.answer: Our AI analyzes your input (data, text, or description) and automatically generates professional infographics. It selects appropriate visualizations, color schemes, and layouts based on your content type and intended use.

noDesignExperience.question: Can I create infographics without design experience?
noDesignExperience.answer: InfographAI is designed for everyone. Simply input your content or describe what you want, and the AI handles all design aspects including layout, typography, colors, and visual hierarchy.

exportFormats.question: What formats can I export my infographics in?
exportFormats.answer: You can export your infographics in PNG, JPG, PDF, and SVG formats. Premium users also get access to editable formats and direct social media sharing with platform-optimized dimensions.

freeVersion.question: Is there a free version available?
freeVersion.answer: Yes! You can create up to 3 infographics per day for free with basic templates. Premium plans unlock unlimited creations, advanced templates, higher resolution exports, and priority AI processing.

customizable.question: Can I customize the AI-generated infographics?
customizable.answer: Yes, every generated infographic is fully editable. You can adjust colors, fonts, icons, text, and layout elements. You can also save custom templates for consistent branding.

typesOfInfographics.question: What types of infographics can I create?
typesOfInfographics.answer: You can create various types including statistical infographics, comparison charts, timelines, process diagrams, geographic maps, list-based infographics, and more. Our AI adapts to your content needs.

uploadData.question: Can I upload my own data or images?
uploadData.answer: Yes, you can upload CSV files, Excel spreadsheets, images, and logos. The AI will incorporate your data into beautiful visualizations while maintaining your brand consistency.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: We take data security seriously. All uploads are encrypted, processed securely, and automatically deleted after 24 hours. We never share or use your data for training purposes.
